title: Jessie and The Witch: Lost in the Woods
description: Once upon a time there was a little girl called Jessie. She was on her way home from school one day, when she decided to take a short cut through Stoneville Forest.It wasn't long before she got lost, now she must find her way home before it gets dark.Meeting interesting characters along the way like the cackling witch, the giant fluffy bunny wearing a scarf and a kind woodsman.Jessie must save herself and Ellie her stuffed elephant from the witch.
author: B.A. Tainton
